channel.title: Welcome to my personal page on
channel.description: Recent content in Welcome to my personal page on

item.title: Who controls the past controls the future. Who controls the present controls the past
item.description: He moved over to the window Since about that time, war had been literally continuous, though strictly speaking it had not always been the same war. For several months during his childhood there had been confused street fighting in London itself, some of which he remembered vividly. Inside the flat a fruity voice was reading out a list of figures which had something to do with the production of pig iron.

item.title: About
item.description: A ray on the streets of San Francisco My name is Ray and I hang out in SF. I’m currently soliciting funding for a research nonprofit. Research training I’m a computational neuroscientist with training in experimental biology and large-scale data engineering. I earned my PhD in Neuroscience from the University of California, San Francisco, where I studied whole-brain dynamics in Caenorhabditis elegans in the labs of Saul Kato and Noelle L’Etoile.
